qmodel.description: "Example of quality model imported from xml"

qualityObjective.name: Code coverage above 80%
qualityObjective.description: Average degree to which the source code is tested by the set of Test Cases designed for the system at Unit and Integration levels)

qualityIndicator.name: Unit Test coverage
qualityIndicator.description: Average degree to which the source code is tested by the set of Unit Tests. It should be above 60%

metric.name: Loc covered Unit Tests
metric.description: Lines Of Code covered by Unit Tests

qualityIndicator.name: Integration Test coverage
qualityIndicator.description: Average degree to which the source code is tested by the set of Integration Tests. It should be above 60%

metric.name: Loc covered Integration Tests
metric.description: Lines Of Code covered by Integration Tests

qualityObjective.name: Minimize Technical Debt
qualityObjective.description: Work that needs to be done before a particular job can be considered complete

qualityIndicator.name: Effort needed to fix all issues
